title: Zalila Branding
summary: Complete brand identity design for a unique fashion brand that needed a distinctive identity to stand out in a crowded market.
overview: Zalila is a unique fashion brand that needed a distinctive identity to stand out in a crowded market and communicate its values effectively.
overview2: We began with inâ€‘depth research into the client's market, competitors and target audience. Using this information, we crafted a strategy that combined aesthetic creativity with strategic positioning.
overview3: Our team developed moodboards, sketches and prototypes to align with the client's vision before finalizing the visual system. The new visual identity increased brand recognition and positioned the company as a leader in its field.
deliverables: Logo design and visual identity system

title: Nughayer Branding
summary: Art direction and identity design for a forward-thinking brand looking to establish a strong market presence.
overview: Nughayer approached us with a vision to create a brand that would resonate with modern consumers while maintaining cultural authenticity.
overview2: We conducted extensive market research and brand workshops to understand their unique value proposition.
overview3: The resulting brand identity combines contemporary design principles with traditional elements, creating a distinctive visual language that appeals to their target demographic. The brand launch exceeded expectations, with significant increases in brand recognition and customer engagement.

title: Sadaf Branding
summary: Holistic identity experience that embodies values and vision for a premium lifestyle brand.
overview: Sadaf required a comprehensive brand identity that would reflect their premium positioning and sophisticated target audience.
overview2: We developed a holistic approach that encompassed not just visual identity, but also brand voice, customer experience, and touchpoint design. The result is a cohesive brand system that communicates luxury and authenticity across all channels.
overview3: The brand has seen remarkable growth in market share and customer loyalty since the rebrand.

title: Alhijaz Power Branding
summary: Comprehensive rebrand connecting essence and aesthetics for a power solutions company.
overview: Alhijaz Power needed a complete brand transformation to better reflect their innovative approach to power solutions and their commitment to sustainability. We conducted stakeholder interviews and market analysis to understand their unique positioning.
overview2: The new brand identity emphasizes their technological expertise while maintaining trust and reliability.
overview3: The rebrand has significantly improved their market perception and helped them secure major contracts.

title: Atqen Branding
summary: Brand identity design and art direction for a creative agency looking to refresh their image.
overview: Atqen needed a brand refresh that would better represent their creative capabilities and attract new clients.
overview2: We developed a bold, contemporary identity that showcases their artistic vision while maintaining commercial appeal.
overview3: The new brand has helped them win several high-profile clients and establish themselves as a leading creative agency in their market.

title: Woven
summary: Complete digital transformation including brand identity, social media management, and website design.
overview: Woven needed a complete digital transformation to modernize their brand and improve their online presence.
overview2: We provided comprehensive services including brand identity design, social media strategy, and website development.
overview3: The project resulted in a cohesive digital ecosystem that significantly improved their online engagement and customer acquisition.
